page.title: 12Transport
page.content: {Transport {Flockton The A637 links Huddesfield with junction 38 of the M1 at West Bretton, via Flockton. The village of Flockton has therefore up to 300 vehicles an hour travelling through the village, a large proportion of the vehicles being container wagons and heavy goods vehicles. A weight restriction one way through the village eases the villages traffic problems. {Netherton} The weight restriction on H.G.V. vehicles through Flockton poses a problem to Netherton, as vehicles diverted round Flockton are routed through Netherton on the B6117 to and from the M1 Motorway. There is a proposed by-pass for these villages but due to financiel strictures it has not materialialised.
